sarnie smuggler caught bread handed in southwell .
mystery over 'fake ' parking warnings in nottingham .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: regular live coverage on this page has ended for the day , but breaking news , sport and travel updates will continue to appear through the night .
east midlands live returns from 08:00 on wednesday morning .

documents.title: your misty scenes across the region
text: it 's been more autumn than august out there today , but the mist has provided some excellent photo opportunities .
here 's kimberley , nottinghamshire
this is great dalby in leicestershire
and here 's brailsford in derbyshire .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: police name pensioner killed in oadby
text: a pedestrian who died after being hit by a lorry on the a6 in oadby has been named as ingeborg toach .
the 86-year-old , who lived in the town , sustained serious injuries and was pronounced dead at the scene .
the crash happened near the asda store on the evening of thursday 10 august .
police are still trying to contact relatives of the victim are appealing to anyone who is related to or knows the family of the deceased to get in touch with them .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: vandals burn jubilee bench
text: erewash borough council has tweeted this photo of one of their jubilee benches that 's been vandalised in long eaton .
the authority has appealed for anyone with information to contact the police .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: east midlands weather update : a fairly cloudy night
text: it 'll be fairly cloudy tonight with occasional clearer spells .
lows of 15c ( 59f ) .
it 'll then be cloudy tomorrow morning , with the chance of a few showers .
it 'll steadily brighten up over the course of the afternoon with some evening sunshine expected .
highs of 20c ( 68f ) .
author: Alex Hamilton
BBC Weather

documents.title: on this day : civil war begins in nottingham
text: an important date in nottingham 's and britain 's history - 375 years ago today the english civil war began , when king charles i raised his standard near nottingham castle .
today it 's known as standard hill .
author: Paul Robey
BBC Radio Nottingham

documents.title: police search for burglars on motorbikes
text: police investigating two break-ins in hathersage are asking for help in identifying these men .
a house in jaggers lane was broken into on monday last week .
the intruders searched inside and then left .
later on the same day , a property in nearby mytham bridge was broken into , with cash and jewellery being stolen .
the offenders were disturbed during that break-in and fled on motorbikes .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

text: stanley matthews 's first contract sold

documents.title: missing hyson green girls found
text: two teenage girls - who went missing from hyson green - have been found , nottinghamshire police has said .
amaree ross , 15 and leah devale , 14 , were reported missing yesterday .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man injured in assault
text: a man has been injured in an assault in new basford , nottingham , this afternoon .
nottinghamshire police were called to gawthorne street at about 13:40 bst .
a man was taken to hospital with injuries `` not believed to be life-threatening or altering '' .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

text: # m1 northbound between j24 and j24a # nottinghamshire - lane 1 clsd within rdwks due to a broken down hgv .
recovery en route .

documents.title: bowls club refuses to lift ban on women
text: bowls club refuses to lift ban on women

documents.title: thieves drill into atm to steal cash
text: three men drilled a hole in a cash machine outside a supermarket to steal cash from inside , derbyshire police have said .
it happened at morrisons in ilkeston between 00:10 and 00:15 this morning .
the thieves had their faces covered and left the scene on foot .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: foxes head to sheffield for league cup
text: leicester city 's road to wembley starts tonight when they travel to sheffield united in the second round of the league cup .
the blades are unbeaten at home since january , but foxes boss craig shakespeare has said his side are taking this competition seriously .
remember , the winners of the league cup automatically qualify for the europa league next season .
author: Owynn Atkin
BBC Radio Leicester Sport

documents.title: rugby : tigers ' european fixtures announced
text: leicester tigers will start their european champions cup bid on saturday 14 october away at racing 92 .
the first home game will be played a week later against castres olympique on 21 october .
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: derby gas leak : roads re-open
text: victory road incident update - incident now concluded , cordens and road closures all removed .
incident left with national grid .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: derby gas leak isolated
text: the gas leak in derby which caused as many as 1,000 people to be evacuated earlier has been isolated , the fire service has said .
residents and workers will shortly be allowed back to their homes and businesses in victory road , allenton .
a fire service spokesman said the incident is being scaled down .
engineers from gas company cadent had been working to stop the leak which started after a digger hit and fractured a gas main this morning .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: county ins & outs 2017
text: county ins & outs 2017

documents.title: man jailed for screwdriver attack robbery
text: a 58-year-old man has been jailed for this terrifying robbery in radford in which a shopkeeper was stabbed in the face with a screwdriver .
roy davies , of weetman gardens , nottingham , burst in to the booze stop in ilkeston road in december last year , demanding money from the till .
when the shopkeeper refused , he stabbed him in the face .
a second shopkeeper arrived on scene as davis escaped in a black 4x4 .
the member of staff was left with a serious injury to his face .
the screwdriver narrowly missed his eye ,
davis ' sandal , left at the scene , was tested for dna , leading to his conviction .
he admitted robbery at nottingham crown court today where he was sentenced to eight years .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : funding for lung disease research
text: the university of leicester has been awarded a £ 400,000 grant in an effort to fight lung disease .
the money will fund research into two incurable conditions - chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( copd ) and idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis ( ipf ) .
ipf means continuously developing scars on the lungs .
after diagnosis , people with the condition have an average life expectancy of three to five years .
copd causes narrowed airways and often leaves people affected with a greatly reduced quality of life .
both conditions make it difficult to breathe .
research into genetic treatment will be carried out by a team led by professor louise wain .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: barn set alight in peak district village
text: we are investigating a further arson to straw bails and a barn on dark lane , # alport .
occurred approx 2030hrs 18/8 .
any info ?
contact # drct
perhaps use the agricultural spelling , bales .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man injured in kirby muxloe explosion
text: an army bomb disposal team were called to kirby muxloe over the weekend to carry out a controlled explosion .
it happened on links road on saturday afternoon following an earlier explosion in which a man received injuries to his hands and lower body .
police have confirmed the initial explosion was not terror related but the exact circumstances are under investigation .
a man has been arrested in connection with the incident .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: afternoon weather update
text: plenty of cloud around throughout the afternoon however there will be a few gaps and breaks here and there , allowing for some brighter spells .
temperatures up to 23c ( 73f ) on a warm and humid afternoon .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: sweary note left for commuter
text: earlier we told you about fake parking letters being left on streets in sneinton to deter commuters , as well as people 's tyres being let down .
this note was left on a car , which was also keyed , in the ardmore close area last year .
nottinghamshire police has advised the recent notices , which claim to be left by the city council , were `` not genuine '' .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: mystery over 'fake ' parking letters
text: mystery over 'fake ' parking letters

documents.title: peak district beauty spot second most trodden
text: eight of the top 20 most popular areas for walkers , cyclists and runners in britain are in the derbyshire peak district , according to ordnance survey .
the national mapping agency compiled the list by dividing britain into square kilometres and counting the number of downloaded routes that passed through each square .
the number one spot went to snowdon in wales .
but number two was edale , with the top 20 also including nearby edale cross , jacob 's ladder , mam tor and hollins cross , among other peak district spots .
click here for the full list .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: blind dog day to celebrate 'special animals '
text: tomorrow is the first ever international blind dog day .
the rspca is encouraging all dog owners with blind pets to `` embrace the day '' and celebrate their special and unique animals .
these three puppies are being cared for by the charity in derby - angel , leo and lexie have no sight at all .
sadie brice is a supporter engagement officer for the rspca in derby and said their blindness is a result of breeding dogs with the `` merle '' gene .
she said these genetics increase the chances of a puppy being born with issues , such as being blind or deaf , by 25 % .
the breeder of these puppies had eight in total and was unable to cope with the extra needs of the three that were blind .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: nottingham tram 'sexual touching ' witnesses sought
text: police are seeking witnesses after a 10-year-old boy was allegedly touched inappropriately on a nottingham tram .
these four people could have witnessed what happened , nottinghamshire police said .
the boy was allegedly touched on wednesday at 13:55 between hyson green and the city centre .
a 49-year-old radford man denied sexual touching of a child at nottingham magistrates ' court yesterday and was released on bail .
he 's due to appear at the city 's crown court in september .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police watchdog investigates fatal crash
text: the police watchdog has begun an independent investigation into the fatal crash in the alvaston area of derby last night .
the independent police complaints commission said it was notified by derbyshire constabulary early this morning because the vehicle , a vauxhall corsa , had been followed by a police officer .
a spokesperson said : `` we have deployed investigators to the scene and to police post-incident procedures , and enquiries are continuing . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: let 's be dabbing you
text: ilkeston - vehicle used in crime and driver wanted for 6 fuel drive offs .
vehicle located by rpu and arrested theft x6 # teamwork
@ twitterid whodafookisthisguy
thanks for taking some advice .
great impression of usain bolt
they can run but will be found
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: derby gas leak : 'digger hit main '
text: an employee of foremost specialist products in derby has told me he saw a `` haze of gas '' when a digger hit the mains pipe near victory road .
author: Heidi Booth
Journalist, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: driver reports firearm threat
text: police are investigating an allegation that a van driver threatened another driver in desford with a firearm .
it 's believed to have happened on friday evening as the vehicles approached the crossroads in the town .
police have arrested a 59-year-old man and are appealing for any information from the public who may have seen something .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: derby gas leak : smell of gas in the air
text: victory road incident update - the gas board have advised that there will be a strong smell of gas in the air for some time today .
author: Dave Wade

documents.title: mansfield sign oxford 's hemmings on loan
text: mansfield sign oxford 's hemmings on loan

documents.title: derby gas leak : up to 1,000 people evacuated
text: the fire service has said between 500 and 1,000 people have been evacuated in derby while they deal with a fractured gas main .
it 's mainly affecting the victory park industrial estate , where engineering firm gardner aerospace is based .
# kingsway green & # nottsroad green are attending to a gas main cracked and leaking on victory road , allenton .
please avoid the area .
a 200mtr cordon is now in place around the entrance to victory park industrial estate whilst the incident is ongoing .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: eckington lads head to paris for subbuteo world cup
text: three lads form eckington in derbyshire are going to paris next month to play for england in the subbuteo world cup in paris .
thomas price , 14 , joseph kinrade , 14 , and conor atkin , 12 , will be competing in elancourt on the outskirts of paris on 2 and 3 september .
author: Kat Cowan
Reporter, BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: house prices rise in central england
text: house prices in the east midlands are seeing a `` mini-boom '' according to property website rightmove .
derbyshire has one of the `` hottest markets '' with asking prices up annually by 7.9 % .
in nottinghamshire that figure is 7.1 % and in leicestershire it 's 6.9 % .
all are more than double the 3.1 % annual increase in asking prices seen across england and wales as a whole .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tax evading florist jailed over smuggled alcohol and cigarettes
text: a florist has been jailed after evading over £ 100,000 in vat and selling smuggled alcohol and cigarettes .
hmrc inspectors visited flowers by scrumpy in gedling in 2015 and found the smuggled goods under his shop 's counter and in storage boxes .
paul taylor , 54 , claimed 630 litres of wine , 2,990 litres of spirits , 5,875 cigarettes , 81 cigars and 4.97kg of hand rolling tobacco were for his personal use .
two months later , he was stopped at east midlands airport with 4,800 cigarettes and 2.5kg of tobacco .
the goods were seized and he was warned on both occasions .
but when hmrc visited his shop , which doubled as an off-licence , a second time and found 1,000 foreign duty-paid cigarettes and 2.2kg of tobacco in july last year , he was arrested .
bank records showed taylor was lying on his tax returns and records showed sales were not being declared to evade £ 134,338 in vat .
taylor , of carlton , was jailed for 28 months at nottingham crown court on friday after he admitted evading £ 134,338 vat and £ 14,517 excise duty .
confiscation proceedings are now underway to recover the stolen tax , hmrc said .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: forest sign leeds midfielder bridcutt
text: forest sign leeds midfielder bridcutt

documents.title: derby gas leak : rolls-royce not evacuated
text: the rolls-royce site has not been evacuated due to the victory road gas leak , contrary to local media reports .
the firm has said it 's awaiting advice from the fire service but their buildings are not in the evacuation zone .
author: Chris Doidge
BBC Radio Derby, political reporter

documents.title: second girl reported missing from hyson green
text: this is 15-year-old amaree ross , who has also been reported missing from hyson green in nottingham .
she was last seen yesterday and may have gone missing with leah devale , 14 .
amaree was last seen wearing a grey hoodie , black leggings and grey boots and was carrying a big black bag .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: have you seen missing leah ?
text: police say they 're concerned for the safety of a 14-year-old girl who went missing from hyson green in nottingham yesterday .
leah devale was last seen wearing black jeans and a beige top .
police believe she may have gone missing with another girl , amaree ross , 15 , who was also reported missing from hyson green yesterday .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: more money to find madeleine
text: police investigating the disappearance of madeleine mccann are to ask for more funds to extend their search , it has been reported .
more than £ 11m has been spent on the probe to find the missing girl from rothley .
she vanished from the family 's holiday apartment in praia da luz in portugal in may 2007 , aged three .

with funding for the investigation in place until the end of september , the metropolitan police are to request more money from the government `` to pursue a final line of inquiry '' , according to sky news .
author: Press Association

documents.title: false alarm at city hospital
text: firefighters are leaving the scene at nottingham city hospital .
a smell of burning was reported but it has turned out to be a false alarm .
patients were n't allowed to enter the hospital - this was the scene at the maternity ward earlier .
they 've now been allowed back in .
crews have done a full search of the area and this has turned out to be false alarm , they 're leaving the scene now .
# hereforyou # nottingham
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: evacuations after gas main leak in derby
text: homes and businesses have been evacuated after a high pressure gas main was fractured in derby .
it 's believed a vehicle has hit the main in victory road , allenton , causing gas to escape , according to the fire service .
derbyshire police have closed victory road , where rolls-royce is based , osmaston park road and moor lane .
there are two fire engines at the scene , as well as police .
the gas board are heading to the site .
we 'll bring you more when we get it .
# kingsway green & # nottsroad green are attending to a gas main cracked and leaking on victory road , allenton .
please avoid the area .
a 200mtr cordon is now in place around the entrance to victory park industrial estate whilst the incident is ongoing .
hi guys it the road closed there ?
@ twitterid have closed victory road , allenton from the junction of osmaston road & moor lane .
thank you : )
i thought kingsway had a 16 plate truck not 66
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: leicestershire extend pillans loan
text: leicestershire extend pillans loan

documents.title: racegoers stash alcohol in salami sandwich
text: how about this for innovation ?
stewards at southwell racecourse made the discovery when checking through on the gates before their ladies day meeting on sunday .
racegoers are not allowed to take alcohol onto the site .

a spokesperson for the racecourse said they are used to people trying to sneak alcohol in in things like water bottles , but admitted someone using a salami and tomato sandwich was `` a new one for us . ''
the vodka was confiscated and is still waiting to be collected at the racecourse 's office
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: a6 reopened following fatal crash
text: the section of the a6 that was closed is now open again .
the a6 london road at # alvaston is now open following the collision last night .
thank you to drivers and residents for your patience .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: fatal a6 crash : car smashed into woman 's wall
text: this is the home of angela verdon - she says the car being followed by police in derby last night crashed into her front wall .
she 's told the bbc she was at the back of the house watching a film when there was a `` very loud bang '' , which she said sounded like a `` blast '' .
this was followed by a `` scene of incredible activity '' with lots of emergency services vehicles .
she said `` somebody was in great distress '' so she did n't interfere but about an hour later she had a knock on the door to tell her the gas supply to her house needed to be turned off .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: smell of burning at nottingham hospital
text: firefighters are investigating a smell of burning at nottingham city hospital .
a nottinghamshire fire and rescue service spokeswoman said they were called to the hospital in hucknall road at about 08:40 after an alarm went off .
pumps from arnold , stockhill and carlton are at the scene .
we 'll bring you more when we get it .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: loughborough bells heading to ypres
text: eight new bells , cast to commemorate the 100th anniversary of the battle of passchendaele , are leaving taylor bell foundry in loughborough today .
the bells will travel on two world war i army lorries to st george 's memorial church in ypres where it 's hoped they will ring out over the battlefield site for a further 100 years .
they 're making a few stops along the way - firstly to visit the war memorial at queen 's park in loughborough where there 'll be a ceremony .
the public will be able to see them and wave off the bells .
author: Helen McCarthy
BBC Radio Leicester Reporter

documents.title: 'hero ' river boy up for bravery award
text: a boy who drowned trying to rescue a friend from beeston weir in nottinghamshire is being nominated for a pride of britain award .
twelve-year-old owen jenkins was described as a `` hero '' by family and friends .
his body was found in the river trent on 10 july after a major search .
rev jez prance , who led owen 's funeral , said : `` if ever there was a deserving young man it would be owen
`` we all like to think that should we ever be in a similar situation we act with the same selfless heroism that owen acted with . ''
pride of britain awards will be screened on itv in october .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather for the east midlands
text: here 's how it 's looking today
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: a6 crash : witnesses describe 'fast ' police chase
text: we 've spoken to some people who say they witnessed the crash on the a6 near alvaston park in derby .
one person said : `` a car was going at speed , my son was nearly hit by the car , thank god he 's ok . ''
another said : `` i heard a car screaming past our house last night followed by a very fast police car .
then for the next hour various sirens and blue flashing lights passing . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: fake letters deter commuter parking
text: official looking letters have been appearing on nottingham streets asking people to stop parking there .
the letters , complete with city council logo , warn commuters parking on roads in sneinton they will be towed away and claim double yellow lines are being introduced .
one driver found a screw wedged in his tyre and others have had their tyres let down .
here in ardmore close , the tactic seems to have worked - there were no cars parked when our reporter went down yesterday .
the city council has confirmed the letters are n't genuine and it has no plans for extra enforcement in the area .
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: fatal a6 crash : car was being followed by police
text: police have released more information about the crash on the a6 in derby .
they 've said an officer was following a car along the road at 23:30 last night when it collided with a central reservation .
the passenger - a man in his 20s - died , while the driver was taken to hospital , where he 's in a stable condition .
derbyshire constabulary has referred itself to the police watchdog - the independent police complaints commission .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : latest on east midlands ' roads
text: apart from the problems on the a6 in derby this morning , here are the other traffic issues on the roads :
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: iborra suffering with groin injury
text: craig shakespeare has told the bbc vicente iborra is behind his team mates in terms of fitness .
iborra is struggling with a groin injury and has n't featured in the first two games of the new season .
the leicester city manager said that he 's expecting the spanish midfielder to be back after the international break .
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: crash closes road for 'many hours '
text: a section of the a6 in derby is closed this morning following a crash - here 's a message from the police .
and here 's the scene :
part of the a6 between wisgreaves road and haig street in # derby will be closed for many hours today due to a collision .
has the collision happened yet ?
this sounds a bit @ twitterid
tuts

documents.title: join us for today 's live news coverage
text: good morning leicestershire , derbyshire and nottinghamshire .
i 'll be writing your east midlands live updates today along with dave wade .
if you 'd like to get in touch with us you can send an email or use facebook or twitter .
